15 Mar 2014 by rorcbin on What can you do with anthropology? whatcanyoudowithanthropology.wordpress.com/2014/03/15/anthropology-and-circumcision/
Male and female circumcisions are not just biological practices on humans’ bodies … circumcisions in an anthropological view. He believed that male and female circumcisions both challenge the cultural relativism and social morality. For example in many parts of Africa, female circumcision is considered a requirement of adult ceremony. The surgical …
